title: Old house near Weligama and Mirissa
details:
Located just 3km inland from Weligama Beach and 5km from Mirissa this old-style house has four bedrooms, a kitchen, a dining room and a large living room. The house, including all the windows and doors, is in good condition.

This house is situated in a large plot of over two acres with many coconut palms and cinnamon trees.

The land has water and electricity connections and a good access road.
